metadata.title: USN-4268-1 -- OpenSMTPD vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenSMTPD incorrectly verified the sender's or receiver's e-mail addresses under certain conditions. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands as root.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4268-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  opensmtpd - 6.0.3p1-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
